headline: SOCIALISTS PLAN TO DISCREDIT MR. ROOT; Yale Professor, a Russian, Suggests That Commission Should Be Revised. DANGER OF SEPARATE PEACE Says Socialists Here Have Already Written and Will Cable to Impugn Commission. Words of Caution. Threat of Socialists Here. SOCIALISTS PLAN TO DISCREDIT MR. ROOT Says wilson should Act. Speech makes an Impression. Send Troops Now, Says Hughes. ROOT IS UNFIT, HILLQUIT SAYS. Russian Socialists, He Adds, Know What Party Here Thinks of Him. LAW FORBIDS INTERFERNCE. Heavy Penalty for Influencing Action of a Foreign Government.

headline: NO MAY 1 STRIKE, BERLIN REPORTS; Proclaims Agitators' Failure and Offers Reward for Prosecution of Enemy Agents.
